Key Match Events: Zach LaVine and Coby White each dropped 33 points apiece
Pre-Game Insights: The Bulls announced that they would be lifting Derrick Rose's jersey into the rafters next season
Post-Match Reflections: Coby White told everyone how important this game was to honor Rose
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Bulls have now won three of their last four games
The Bulls have beaten four of the top five teams in the Eastern Conference this season
Others: The Bulls move to 16-19 on the season
